name: Dice Coliseum
description:
[Created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam]

Lead the gladiator, fight and roll your way through 4 hand drawn opponents in the dice coliseum!

Mouse and keyboard

Tutorial:

  • Roll the dice with the roll button
  • Save your dice by clicking on them or re-roll 2 times
  • Change your mind? Click your saved dice to take them out of the holder
  • Order your dice for maximum impact! Be careful of the enemy roll
  • When you win use the prizes to customise your dice!
